tensorzero/tensorzero

Open-source tools for running and improving LLM applications—gateway, observability, data feedback, optimization

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Unified environment for developing and testing LLM agents with feedback
  • tensor library for machine learning with support for hardware acceleration and model inference
  • Benchmarks LLMs for end-to-end machine learning workflows
  • curated list of tools and frameworks for building LLM apps
  • open-source reimplementation of Google’s TensorProcessing Unit by UC Santa Barbara ArchLab
  • Benchmark for LLMs on software engineering tasks
  • open-source memory engine for LLMs and AI agents
  • Python toolkit for building LLM and RAG apps with lots of small, specialized models
  • Curated list of tools for running LLMs locally
  • Open-source framework for building stateful LLM applications
